_comment: Created by EFisher on 03/12/2015 13:08:33 using v2.7
title: Did patients know how to contact an out-of hours GP service when their surgery is closed?
analysis_commentary: In 2011/12 58% of patients said that they know how to contact out-of-hours GP services (patients were asked about contacting an out-of hours GP service when your GP surgery their closed and not to include NHS Direct, NHS walk-in centres or A&E). This subsequently declined to around 56% between July 2013 and March 2014, and has remained around this value for the last three surveys. Between July 2014 and March 2015, the latest data point, the value is 56% showing there is still a large proportion of patients who do not know how to contact their out-of-hours GP services.
